comments.body: A comment explaining this return would be nice
I'm probably missing something obvious, but what's the difference between `path` and `file`?
Path is canonical file name thats also absolute. file is just name so on windows path will be lowercased.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +677,681 @@
        function watchFilePath(
            path: Path,
            file: string,
            callback: (fileName: string, eventKind: FileWatcherEventKind, filePath: Path) => void,
